warning-block-2:
Before reusing the data contained on ENVIENDOC, we draw everyoneâ€™s attention to the absolute necessity of using this data taking into account the specificities of each of the databases aggregated on the site, in particular with regard to uncertainties about the quality of the data provided by each data producer. Please refer each time to the documentation of each producer.
